    Subset the datamart predictor data to only the active predictors.

    filterActiveOnly.Rd

    Subset the datamart predictor data to only the active predictors.

    filterActiveOnly(dt, reverse = F)

    Arguments

    dt

    Predictor datamart table

    reverse

    Boolean to flip the operation.

    Value

    A data.table.

    Examples

    data(adm_datamart)
filterActiveOnly(adm_datamart$predictordata)
#>                                              PredictorName
